title: Authors and Citation
Authors and Citation
text: Nakken S.  (2022)  gwasOncoX: Low--moderate risk variants cancer.  R package version 1.5.0.  (https://github.com/sigven/gwasOncoX)
code: @Manual{,   title = {gwasOncoX: Low-to-moderate risk variants from GWAS studies in cancer},   author = {Sigve Nakken},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 1.5.0},   url = {https://github.com/sigven/gwasOncoX}, }

what: Human GWAS tracks for the oncology domain
title: Human GWAS tracks for the oncology domain
text: goal gwasOncoX offer R package simplifies process retrieving variant data track files (VCF, BED) low--moderate risk variants associated cancer, found genome-wide association studies. package utilizes googledrive R package download pre-processed documented datasets local cache directory provided user.

title: Human GWAS tracks for the oncology domain
Human GWAS tracks for the oncology domain
text: package offers (currently) three different functions: get_variants() - retrieves phenotype information related GWAS variants cancer (GWAS catalog metadata - version, citation etc.) get_bed() - retrieves BED tracks ( grch37 grch38 ) variants associated cancer get_vcf() - retrieves VCF files ( grch37 grch38 ) variants associated cancer.

title: Human GWAS tracks for the oncology domain
text: use datasets provided gwasOncoX, make sure properly cite NHGRI-EBI Catalog human genome-wide association studies: Sollis et al., Nucleic Acids Res, 2022

title: Human GWAS tracks for the oncology domain

what: Get BED file with GWAS variants — get_bed
title: Get BED file with GWAS variants — get_bed
text: Downloads tabix-indexed BED file (.bed.gz .bed.gz.tbi) low modest risk variants  associated disease phenotypes (found NHGRI-EBI GWAS catalog). variants risk-allele properly identified included . name record BED file following format: rsid|risk_allele|pmid|tag_snp|p_valule|efo_id (multiple instances separated sign)

title: Get BED file with GWAS variants — get_bed
code: get_bed(cache_dir = NA, force_download = F, build = "grch37", cancer_only = T)

title: Get BED file with GWAS variants — get_bed
text: cache_dir Local directory data download force_download Logical indicating local cache overwritten (set TRUE force download file exists cache) build genome assembly (grch37/grch38) cancer_only logical indicating retrieval variants versus cancer-associated variants

title: Get BED file with GWAS variants — get_bed
text: data frame file download information metadata

what: Function that retrieves gwasOncoX data from Google Drive — get_gwas_data
title: Function that retrieves gwasOncoX data from Google Drive — get_gwas_data
text: Function retrieves gwasOncoX data Google Drive

title: Function that retrieves gwasOncoX data from Google Drive — get_gwas_data
code: get_gwas_data(   cache_dir = NA,   force_download = F,   cancer_only = T,   build = "grch38",   data_type = "vcf" )

title: Function that retrieves gwasOncoX data from Google Drive — get_gwas_data
text: cache_dir Local directory data download force_download Logical indicating local cache overwritten (set TRUE force download file exists cache) cancer_only retrieve data relevant cancer phenotypes build genome assembly (grch37/grch38) data_type type data retrieved (bed, vcf, rds)

title: Get GWAS-associated variants — get_variants
text: Downloads returns dataset low modest risk variants associated disease phenotypes - discovered genome-wide association studies (NHGRI-EBI GWAS catalog)

title: Get GWAS-associated variants — get_variants
code: get_variants(cache_dir = NA, force_overwrite = F, cancer_only = T)

title: Get GWAS-associated variants — get_variants
text: cache_dir Local directory data download force_overwrite Logical indicating local cache overwritten (set TRUE re-download file exists cache) cancer_only logical indicating retrieval variants versus cancer-associated variants

title: Get GWAS-associated variants — get_variants
text: list object two elements records - data frame variant annotations (phenotype ID, association p-value, risk allele, PMID etc.) GWAS Catalog variants metadata - GWAS Catalog metadata

what: Get VCF file with GWAS variants — get_vcf
title: Get VCF file with GWAS variants — get_vcf
text: Downloads tabix-indexed VCF file (.vcf.gz .vcf.gz.tbi) variants associated disease phenotypes (found NHGRI-EBI GWAS catalog). variants risk-allele properly identified included . GWAS_HIT element INFO column following format: rsid|risk_allele|pmid|tag_snp|p_valule|efo_id

title: Get VCF file with GWAS variants — get_vcf
code: get_vcf(cache_dir = NA, force_download = F, build = "grch37", cancer_only = T)

title: Get VCF file with GWAS variants — get_vcf
text: cache_dir Local directory data download force_download Logical indicating local cache overwritten (set TRUE force download file exists cache) build genome assembly (grch37/grch38) cancer_only logical indicating retrieval variants versus cancer-associated variants

title: Get VCF file with GWAS variants — get_vcf
text: data frame file download information metadata
